List.Name: Nessy's Pretty Pink Potion
List.Description: One swig of this potion and your pigmy will strike with **4x** the force!

List.Name: Goblinskin Hat
List.Description: Pigmy increases base materials collected when claiming by *1*. *x3* for all *skinny* materials

List.Name: Flower Crown
List.Description: Pigmy increases base materials collected when claiming by *3*. *x3* for all *herby* materials

List.Name: The Overbearing
List.Description: Increases *pigmy xp* when claiming by *5%*, Decreases *Player xp* by *3%*

List.Name: The Demanding
List.Description: Increases *pigmy xp* when claiming by *7%*, Decreases *Player xp* by *7%*

List.Name: The Ugly
List.Description: Decreases *pigmy xp* when claiming by *7%*, Increases *Player xp* by *10%*

List.Name: Machine Schematics
List.Description: Unkown uses, Unknown Crafting, Written in an unknown language
